short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Checks wind forecast and adds to Google Calendar if over 5 km/h

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Wind AI provides 7 day wind sport forecasts for your location and adds them to Google Calendar. You can select your local town or city and get daily forecasts and suggested wing and kite sizes based on your skill level and weight. Our wind forecasts use artificial intelligence and leverages a powerful combination of weather models from national weather services. These local forecasts are great for kiteboarders, wing foilers, windsurfers or any other wind sport addict.

Our weather models rely on a wealth of real-time data, including measurements from various sources such as airplanes, buoys, radar systems, and satellites. By incorporating this diverse and comprehensive data, our numerical weather predictions provide a deeper analysis than traditional weather stations, resulting in more accurate wind forecasts for getting you out to your best sessions.
